casebody.data:
BRITT
v.
STATE of N.C. No. 488A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 18, 2008. Dan L. Hardway, for Barney Britt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of January 2008 by State of NC for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 7th day of March 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of January 2008."
